effects: Section 32 of Act 776 (2025) appropriates $4.5 million from the State Central Services Fund to the Administrative Office of the Courts for specialty court programs in FY 2026【556692708300381†L760-L776】.  These funds are available for operating expenses, professional fees and services, and grants and aid to counties and municipalities, ensuring adequate support for specialty courts such as drug‑, veteran‑ and mental‑health treatment courts across the state.
